name: The Cave of Delusions-Demo
description:
The Cave, who ventures inside falls int insanity. The Cave of Delusions is full of darkness a void of pain. Protagonist lost in the mountain range, finds a way inside mysterious entrance, getting inside awaits unknown faith full of misery  and hope to find the way out. Collect gems, pages and watch after time.

  1. Group of 4 people.- 12 week.
  2. Level Design 3 people.
  3. Character design 2 people
  4.  Ui 2 people.
  5.   Damage,Health,Inventroy, 1 Pearson.
  6. -Included Sound 2 people. 
  7. Meshes import or modelled 2 People.
  8. Weather-1 Pearson. 
  9. Platform related actors 2 people.
  10.  Traps- 2 People.
  11. View visibility range 2 people.
  12. Pick up items 2 people.
